% prelude for texinfo files generated by dosfop
\def\dfVersion{1.3}
\def\dfDate{Wed May  7 20:01:50 1997}
\message{dosfopPrelude Version \dfVersion \dfDate}
% dosfoplatin1 defines (most) characters of ISO-8859-1
\input dosfopLatin1.sty
% make inclusion of psotscript figures possible
\input psfig
% the PSTricks macro package provides functionalities for postscript-graphic */
% generation that is needed for the construction of hierarchy visualizations.
%%% PROBLEMS ON NEWER TeTeX releases??  wg 27.4.99
%\input pstricks
%\input pst-node
